title: Implementation Services -  Estimated Usage
description: **Note:** These usage metrics are estimates that are not always matched to billable usage given their real-time nature. There is a 10-20% difference between estimated usage and billable usage on average. Due to the nature of the estimations, the margin of error is larger for small usage. (cloned)

definition.title: Percentage of Logs Correlated with APM Services

definition.content:
CSM Pro: Billed through CSPM estimated usage for now
CSM enterprise: CSPM estimated usage + CWS estimated usage, deduped (we can't do that in a dashboard)
CWS standalone: CWS estimated usage

# Datadog Implementation Services: Product Utilization Dashboard

Keep track of your usage at a glance during your Datadog deployment.

## Useful Links

- [Estimated Usage metrics](https://docs.datadoghq.com/account_management/billing/usage_metrics/)

- [Estimate your product allotments](https://www.datadoghq.com/pricing/allotments/)
